details: Sensation of burning and pressure everywhere.

Head: Eyes inflamed and burning
Nose itches; sneezing; nosebleed
Lips dry and cracked
Heavy headache, as if temples were pressed in; pressure in nasal and facial bones
Bursting aching in eyeballs
Red burning face
Mind: Unable to concentrate; starts at any noise
Chest: Palpitation, cardiac pain, slow intermittent pulse
Dyspnoea, cough with pain in chest in spots, feels as if spitting blood
Bladder feels full, swollen; frequent inclination without success

name: Piper nigrum
